programme.title: Get Blake - EP 0013 & 0014
programme.desc: Blake and his best friend Mitch constantly find themselves under siege by three silly squirrels in their city block. These are not just regular old Earth-squirrels, they're ALIEN squirrels! They have been sent from the future with one secret goal: capture Blake!

programme.title: Future Card Buddyfight Ace - EP 14
programme.desc: The anime's story takes place 23 years after the events of Future Card Buddyfight X and centres on Yuga Mikado, son of Gao Mikado. programme.title: Argo's World - EP 13
programme.desc: A super blood moon eclipse is going to happen and Marie wants to find out the best way to photograph it. During her adventure in cyberspace, Marie also learns about the planets around earth and what it's like to work in Space.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather - EP 7

programme.title: Pay The Ghost
programme.desc: A professor frantically searches for his son who was abducted during a Halloween parade.

programme.title: Grimm 6 - EP 4
programme.desc: Back at work, Nick, Hank and Wu investigate a baby abduction tied to an ancient Wesen legend of El Cuegle, which steals and eats babies. Meanwhile, Adalind takes Diana to stay with Renard, while Eve examines the stick.

programme.title: Grimm 6 - EP 4
programme.desc: Back at work, Nick, Hank and Wu investigate a baby abduction tied to an ancient Wesen legend of El Cuegle, which steals and eats babies. Meanwhile, Adalind takes Diana to stay with Renard, while Eve examines the stick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead 7 - EP 4
programme.desc: In Season 7, Rick and his group's world becomes even more brutal due to Negan's deadly example of what happens if they don't live under his rules. Everyone must begin again.

programme.title: Halfworlds 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Set in Bangkok, Halfworlds 2 follows Juliet, a tenacious researcher trying to uncover the hidden world of the Peesaj - demons who look like humans and live amongst them. Juliet's world is soon turned upside down when her curiosity attracts the attention of these immortal beings, and a Peesaj named Fyter is sent to kill her.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia 12 - EP 5
programme.desc: Maureen Ponderosa (who is now almost finished with her operation to turn into an anthropomorphic cat) is found dead in an alley, and Dennis (based on his short-lived marriage to her and the growing evidence that he sexually assaults women) is the prime suspect.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia 12 - EP 7
programme.desc: After a male stripper realizes he's hit rock bottom by sleeping with her, Dee sets out to help the stripper re-evaluate his life. Meanwhile, Mac and Frank get hooked on a VR war game that takes a mental toll on Mac.

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip - EP 6
programme.desc: On his trip, Jamie delves into the underbelly of American society to uncover fascinating personal stories, try real American food and meet the most interesting but unsung chefs and food producers the country has to offer. The epic journey takes Jamie to the heart of America.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune 36 - EP 6913 & 6914
programme.desc: (Encore) Wheel Of Fortune is an American television game show created by Merv Griffin. The show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 9 - EP 83
programme.desc: (Encore) An interview with actress Nicole Eggert, who says her Charles in Charge (1984) co-star Scott Baio took advantage of her sexually, when she was a minor.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is J. Jumping Jellybeans are jumping from planet to planet, disrupting the residents of the alphabet planets.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 10
programme.desc: A honey bee drops in on Leo's picnic. The Junior Rangers buzz down to the forest to guide the honey bee back to its beehive, but an encounter with some wasps could prove too much for the Junior Rangers to handle. A baby bottlenose dolphin is the last animal Leo expects to see in his garden pond. But when the unexpectable happens, the Junior Rangers start on an expedition to find the dolphin's mother.

programme.title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: WINNIE THE POOH, TIGGER and the gang have a new friend - an adorable six-year-old girl named DARBY - joining them for new adventures in the Hundred Acre Wood.

programme.title: Babar And The Adventures Of Badou - EP 54
programme.desc: Adventure in Celestville! From Pirate Adventures to The Rescuteers, Badou is our fearless leader and we see him in action as the head of the rescue club and he visits his friend Chiku in Monkeyville. Every episode is a true adventure as Babar, Badou, and all his friends explore the exciting world of Celestville.

programme.title: Sesame Street 46 - EP 0019 & 0020
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Kody Kapow - EP 14
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 18
programme.desc: Arashi longs to follow his father's footsteps to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner. He partners up with the Wild Liger and forms the new Team Freedom. Together, they will face many adventures, including the main antagonists the Death Metal Empire!

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 8
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 6
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: DinoCore - EP 0003 & 0004
programme.desc: "Baryon", the great Dino Master of Dino Star, is defeated by the evil "Darkno". Before he dies, he sends his three most trusted DinoCores: Tyranno, Saber and Stego, to Earth with the ancient guardian Dino Tuner. Many years after Baryon's defeat, a carefree boy named Rex comes across the Tuner and becomes the new Dino Master. Meanwhile, Darkno takes over one planet after another and finally reaches Earth.

programme.title: Super4orce - EP 1
programme.desc: The lives of 4 misfit teens are changed when Jake discovers a mysterious formula and a super force blasts out from the Science Fair at Academy of Talented & Extraordinary Minds (A.T.E.M.); thus bestowing them with great powers but also uncovering great danger. Now 2 mysterious men are after the other kids with powers and Jake...Will Jake get caught or will he escape?

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring The Future - EP 4
programme.desc: Bjorn visits local food SMEs - Lim Kee and Bakers Heaven, which are both adamant that quality should not be compromised but instead, improved with automation.

programme.title: Young Euro Classic 2017 Highlights
programme.desc: Over the course of 19 days, the best youth orchestras in the world led by great conductors and flanked by virtuoso soloists guaranteed exciting and inspiring concert performances at the Young Euro Classical 2017. The festival is known to be the most important platform for international young orchestra musicians in the European classical music tradition and for its development.

programme.desc: (R) Liu Bei's two wives and his only son, A-dou, have gone missing in battle. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)刘备的独生儿子阿斗，以及其两位夫人，不幸在战役中失散。赵子龙浑身是胆，单枪匹马纵横进出于曹操的数万大军之中，终于把小主人阿斗救了出来。.

programme.title: 叮当神探 Crime Busters x 2 - EP 0019 & 0020
programme.desc: (R) Since his partner got killed in action 5 years ago by a serial killer dubbed "Surgical Demon", Jieliang has shouldered the responsibility (and transferred out of CID) and has been reclusive, choosing not to team up with others... (PG13-暴力画面)(重)(大结局)由于本节目呈现暴力镜头,若儿童观赏,应有家长指导.演员: 郑斌辉饰吕大雄; 姚懿珊饰夏静宜;陈泓宇饰姜在熙; 蔡琦慧饰于洁.

programme.title: 那年花开月正圆 Nothing Gold Can Stay - EP 0051 & 0052
programme.desc: (R) In front of Wu Pin's grave, Zhou Ying tricks Hu Yong Mei into admitting that she killed Wu Pin with poison. Seized by panic, Hu Yong Mei picks up a knife and attempts to stab Zhou Ying. Zhou Ying avoids the attack but her aged father dies in her place. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)在吴聘坟前，周莹施计诱导胡咏梅承认毒死吴聘。一时惊慌失措，胡咏梅抓起了地上的一把刀子，向周莹直冲了过去。但胡咏梅这一刀并没刺中周莹，却捅死了赶来救她的周老四。.

programme.title: 玩家万岁 Home Makeover - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) In this hilarious and entertaining home renovation program, join Mark Lee, Kym Ng, and Ben Yeo as they aspire to give a makeover to homes, and bring joy to the homeowners' faces. (重)《玩家万岁》由李国煌、钟琴和杨志龙主持，每集到访不同的家庭，为他们重新打造理想的住家。过程中也会分享许多室内设计与装潢的贴士及好去处。.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 动物情缘 Tuesday Report: My Furry BFF - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) (重)国家经济越繁华富裕，生活安定，关怀动物与饲养动物的人也似乎越来越多，有些人为了调剂生活，有些人为了兴趣嗜好，有些人顺应潮流，有些人却以宠物作为心灵或精神上的寄托。关怀与爱护动物的人怀着各种不同的心态，这个系列探讨了动物与国人之间的微妙关系以及他们背后的故事。.

programme.title: 狮城有约精华版 Hello Singapore Highlights - EP 91
programme.desc: Deliver social features that matter to you. 总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。.

programme.title: 我的万里挑一 My One In A Million - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Kent is scalded by hot coffee, and Shu Yu worries that if she has a crush on Kent she will cause him to suffer, so she keeps her distance. Kent does not understand why Shu Yu is being hot and cold to him. He asks for an explanation, and confesses to her. Shu Yu explains that there is a special reason why the two of them can only stay friends for the time being, and asks Kent to give her some time. Kent assures her that he is willing to wait for her. (PG)(重)Kent被热咖啡溅到，书彧担心自己对Kent有好感会害他受伤，刻意疏远。Kent不解书彧为何忽冷忽热，追问原因，并向她表白。书彧解释因为某个特殊原因，两人暂时只能做朋友，请Kent给她时间。Kent表示愿意等她，两人确定了心意。.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 49
programme.desc: (R) Sha Sha loses the keys to Centenarian Home's front door, and Uncle Yao picks it up and secretly goes out. Philip is worried that Uncle Yao will meet with an accident, so he hurriedly follows him. Sha Sha informs Xin Xin, and Xin Xin anxiously goes out to find them. She finds both Uncle Yao and Philip at Geylang, and wants to bring them back to Centenarian Home, but Uncle Yao refuses. While the three of them argue, reporters appear and aggressively take photos of them. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)莎莎掉了千岁之家的大门钥匙卡，被耀叔捡到，偷溜出去。Philip怕他出事，急忙尾随。莎莎通报欣欣，欣欣急忙外出寻找两人。她在芽笼找到耀叔和Philip，要两人回老人院，耀叔不肯。三人拉扯间记者突然出现，猛拍三人，三人大惊……。.

programme.title: 食尚口袋名單 Gourmet Guides - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Discover sumptuous cuisine in major cities as you get on the food trail, liberally sprinkled with a new list of highly-recommended restaurants. (重)一起去搜寻食尚潮人经常打卡光顾的主题餐厅，让你在结合创意与食尚的舒适空间中尽享美食。店家除了介绍餐厅主题和招牌菜色，也会与你分享食谱.

programme.title: 夜市人生 Night Market Life a.k.a. Life - EP 0964 & 0965
programme.desc: (R) Cai Yuexia operates a stall at a night market while her husband, Qingxiang, works in the Mainland. Their family falls apart when Qingxiang sets up another family outside. Yuexia struggles to bring up her children with the help of the head of the night market - Jiang Yiguan. (PG)(重)在夜市卖药炖排骨的蔡月霞与经商的丈夫李庆祥育有一对子女。原本幸福的家庭却因庆祥在外有另一名女人而被摧毁。月霞辛苦地抚养子女，幸有夜市老大江一官在旁扶持，但月霞的女儿友慧却不支持两人的关系。.

programme.title: 小毛病 大问题 Body SOS - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) In this studio-based talkshow show, Mark Lee and Lee Teng, together with invited celebrities will discuss about health issues. Celebrities may be invited to do "health checks" on the spot. (重).

programme.title: 一点新闻 News 8 At One - EP 91
programme.desc: Weekday afternoon updates on local and world news headlines. 《一点新闻》为您提供更新的本地与全球新闻头条。.

programme.title: 118 118 - EP 215
programme.desc: (R) Hong Daming (118) has lived in Tiong Bahru all his life, running a coffeeshop with his wife. A generous and kind-hearted man by nature, he often helps his extended family, friends and neighbours with their matters. A series of comedy ensures, each reflecting local societal concerns in a light-hearted manner. (PG)(重)人称"118"的洪达明在中峇鲁长大，和妻子靠经营咖啡店为生，在中峇鲁一带可说无人不知。邻里有事，总找他出面解决，他亦当仁不让。大家"济济一堂"，"118"所住的"118"号屋子和"118"号咖啡店，遂发生了一起又一起的好事、坏事、趣事、糗事、怪事、妙事….

programme.title: 小小超人趣旅游 Little Incredible Explorer - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, our little incredible explorer heads to a food recycling centre in Tai Po, Hong Kong, to learn about food waste recyling. She goes to a market to collect fruits and vegetables and distribute at the centre. She also learns how to make eco enzymes and helps to cook for the elderly. (重)这集的旅游主题是食物回收。小小超人前往香港大埔的食物回收中心，拯救那些即将被丢弃的食物。在志工的带领下，小朋友先前往街市收集蔬果，接着到中心派发蔬菜。她也将学习制作环保酵素，最后烹调料理给社区长者吃。.

programme.title: 芈月传 The Legend Of Miyue - EP 47
programme.desc: (R) Zhang Yi persuades Emperor Qin to start their war campaign first against the states of Ba and Su as suggested by Ji-er. Ji-er is proven right when Qin conquers the two states swiftly with ease. Fearing that her son, Dang-er, will lose to Ji-er in the race to succeed the throne, Empress Qin plots to kill Ji-er. (PG)(重)张仪说服秦王采纳稷儿的主张，先攻巴与蜀。果如其然，秦军出师大捷，轻而易举就占领了巴与蜀。此结果不禁令秦王后感到担忧，她害怕稷儿将脱颖而出，取代她的荡儿，登基成为未来的秦王。.

programme.title: 1/2 缘分 You Are The One - EP 1
甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 191
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 入侵者 Doppelganger - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Rui Jie brought Li Wei to the Home where their father, Jian Ting was admitted for dementia. Much to their surprise, Jian Ting could only recognize Li Wei as his son, and happily let out to him on where he kept his "money". Assuming that Jian Ting was referring to the embezzled funds, Li Wei quickly went to retrieve the "money", only to find out that they were just play money. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)锐明兄弟俩的父亲建廷因为失智，住在疗养院。锐杰带立威去探望，建廷不认得锐杰，见到立威却很开心，认出他是自己的儿子"锐明"，还悄悄告诉"锐明"，他把那些钱收得好好的。立威心里一喜，以为是被挪用的公款，最后却发现只是玩具钞票，大失所望。.

programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 50
programme.desc: Li Sheng brings Xin Xin to the hospital to meet Luo Qi, who introduces herself as Li Sheng's ex-girlfriend. She is sick and does not have family to take care of her. She needs Li Sheng's help to raise her child. Xin Xin finds out that Li Sheng had married her not long after their breakup, and she suspects that Li Sheng does not truly love her. She observes that Xiao Zhe and Li Sheng interact like father and son, and suspects that Li Sheng is really his father! (PG-些许性相关语)力生带欣欣到医院见骆琦，骆琦自我介绍是力生的前女友，因为生病没亲人，又带着孩子，只好找力生帮忙。欣欣得知力生被骆琦甩后不久就和她结婚，开始怀疑力生是否真心爱她，又见小哲和力生互动如同父子，更怀疑两人是父子关系！.

programme.title: 众里寻一 The Destined One - EP 6
programme.desc: Childhood photos of four female candidates are presented to the male panel. Which of the three girls will be eliminated? Celebrities playing Cupid will help her in making a choice on her Destined One. 第六集，艺人红娘、月老带来4位貌美的有缘人，每一位都有自己独特的魅力。6位帅气的男嘉宾对谁得的印象比较深刻？听了红娘、月老的介绍，再欣赏有缘人童年时期的照片，这个环节，分数最低的有缘人被淘汰。在交流后，谁会被留到最后？她是否能与男嘉宾牵手成功？.

programme.title: 我的万里挑一 My One In A Million - EP 11
programme.desc: Shu Yu finds out that Ding Yi is the jinx she has been looking for, and the two of them decide to work together to break their curse. Shu Yu rents a resort house, and helps Ding Yi on an "odour elimination" mission. She uses weird remedies that she learnt from Shu Jing to help Ding Yi with his problem. The whole process is interesting and funny and it brings them both closer. (PG)书彧发现定一就是自己要找的天煞孤星，两人决定合作，解决彼此的问题。书彧租下一间度假屋，帮定一进行“灭狐行动”，用各种书靖找来的偏方为他治疗狐臭问题，搞得定一惊叫连连，过程夸张搞笑，但也增进了彼此的情谊。.

programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 诡探 Detective Psycho - EP 19
programme.desc: Zhiquan enters the boundary set by Li Jiang and is reunited with his wife and son. Zhiquan is unwilling to leave the boundary even though he knows everything before him is imaginary. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)至全进入李江的结界，看到他的老婆和儿子，虽然知道一切都是假像，却不愿意走出结界。.

programme.title: 小女花不弃 I Will Never Let You Go - EP 48
programme.desc: Jianfei informed Dongfang Shi that Chenyu has escaped and Master Zhu and Buqi will be executed. Dongfang Shi thought Buqi has been arrested. So Dongfang Shi and Xiaoxia went to her rescue. Xiaoxia was killed in the process. (PG)白渐飞向东方炻传话，因陈煜逃跑，朱老太爷和不弃将被斩首。东方炻以为不弃被皇帝的人截走，和小虾一同前往去救不弃。小虾为救不弃牺牲。.

programme.title: 不老传说 Immortal Love - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) An amazing tale of immortality and vengeance spanning a century is unleashed when a tabloid reporter investigates rumours about vampire sightings in Singapore during the old days. (重).

programme.title: 今天我代班 Leave It All To Me - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Yi Fong takes up the chainsaw, scales the trees and attempts rope climbing under the scorching sun to work as a tree-pruning worker. On the other hand, Pornsak is having fun with the aboriginal Sarawak profile, playing paintball, skiing, rock climbing and fishing cruising and barbecuing at the sea. (重)怡凤除了拿起电锯登高修树，烈日下砍树修树之外，还挑战了高难度的缆绳攀树，尝尽了苦头。而Pornsak则和来自马来西亚砂拉越的原住民到处吃香喝辣，从漆弹射击到滑雪、攀岩，还包下了游艇出海钓鱼、烤肉。.

programme.title: 爱在女儿香 Love Is In The Air - EP 0018 & 0019
娘家 A Place Called Home - EP 0904 & 0905
programme.desc: (R) This drama is about a woman's struggle to keep pace with being a wife as well as a daughter-in-law and keeping the whole family intact. (PG)(重)退休校长林石狮的三名女儿相继出嫁。尽管如此，石狮从来没有把出嫁的女儿当成泼出去的水。相反的，当女儿们面临不同的婚姻危机及困难时，娘家永远都是她们最可靠的后盾。.

programme.title: 大厨帮帮忙 Hey Chef! 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) What is your favourite dish? Which dish would you want to improve your skills on so you can prepare it for your loved ones? This week, Chef Tan will save Jolin's "Taiwanese minced meat rice". Stay tuned to find out how Chef Tan prepares it in his own unique way. He will also prepare 2 other dishes which you wouldn't want to miss! (重)哪一道美食让你吃过难忘，想亲自下厨动手做好给家人和朋友品尝呢？新加坡首个私人餐饮定制服务的创办人许馨匀，对"台湾肉燥饭"情有独钟，却无法做出理想味道，在主持人Pornsak和赖怡伶的穿针引线之下，请多次参与亚洲各地厨艺大赛，以无限创意展现惊艳烹调风格的陈健伦师傅指点迷津，同时教导另外两道别有一番风味的美味料理。.

programme.title: 小空间 Small Spaces - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) In this new magazine programme, the host Belinda Lee visits interesting apartments in Singapore, Taiwan & Japan and explores how the owners effectively uses the limited spaces through creative designs. (重)"通过这个崭新的节目，李心钰将带领观众到新加坡,台湾和日本的公寓或租屋, 瞧这些主人如何巧妙利用空间，创造独树一格的小天地。节目中也会访问主人或室内设计师，分享聪明利用空间的贴士。".

programme.title: 东游记 Legends Of The Eight Immortals - EP 1

In this mega blockbuster, these legends are dramatized for maximum entertainment, with dazzling special effects, viewers are in for a sensual treat. Taiwanese heart-throb Ma Jingtao lends his impeccable acting skills as the leader of the celestial pack, Lu Dongbin. (重).

programme.title: 谢谢你不离不弃 By Your Side - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Hillary Chua suffers from cerebral palsy, unable to control or coordinate physical actions, and cannot stand or speak at all. Her mother, Cindy Wong has to take care of her. Hillary went through a few operations since young age, including a leg straightening operation. Cindy has to carry her to and from school daily while taking public transport. She has always maintained a positive attitude and hopes to let Hillary enjoy normal life as much as possible. (重)蔡昕娟患有先天脑性麻痹（Cerebral Palsy），无法控制或协调身体行动，完全不能站立、说话等，也患有听觉障碍。母亲王丽云不辞劳苦、亲历亲为照料女儿生活大小事。从出世至今，蔡昕娟经过无数次的手术，其中包括腿部筋肌手术和脊椎矫正手术。王丽云坚持每天为女儿准备新鲜的爱心膳食，希望孩子获得足够的营养。王丽云一直保持积极的心态，每天带着女儿乘搭公共交通去学校上课，因为她希望让孩子尽量享受正常生活。于2017年，彩虹俱乐部颁发"模范看护者奖"给王丽云。.

programme.title: 爱在女儿香 Love Is In The Air - EP 0022 & 0023

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 52
programme.desc: (R) Ping Pong finds out that Xin Xin is troubled over the prostitute incident, and he devises a plan to get Philip to reveal to the reporters that he was the one responsible, sacrificing himself to help Xin Xin's reputation. Xin Xin is upset when she finds out, and Li Sheng also gets unhappy with Ping Pong. Uncle Lottery chides Ping Pong for sacrificing himself because he cannot get over Xin Xin. (PG)(重)Ping Pong得知欣欣为了买春事件而烦恼，心生一计，连同Philip向记者爆假料，谎称自己才是罪魁祸首，牺牲自己挽回了欣欣的声誉。欣欣知道后心里不好过，看在眼里的力生更不是滋味，马票叔则斥责Ping Pong是因为放不下欣欣才自我牺牲。.

programme.title: 职场心起点 Work From The Heart - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) From manual processes at front desk in 1990s to aptly adapting internet banking today as digital technology advances, banking ambassador Lim Chen Chen has been benefitting from many upgrade and upskill programmes, such as Professional Conversion Programme, since she joined the industry 22 years ago. (重)90年代刚加入银行业时，前台服务主要靠人手操作；到现今的数码科技时代，她对网上银行了如指掌。银行大使林贞贞入行22年，接受不少知识和技能培训如《专业人士转业计划》，让她在数码科技时代坚守岗位，游刃有余。.

programme.title: 夜市人生 (PG) Night Market Life a.k.a. Life - EP 0970 & 0971
programme.desc: (R) Cai Yuexia operates a stall at a night market while her husband, Qingxiang, works in the Mainland. Their family falls apart when Qingxiang sets up another family outside. Yuexia struggles to bring up her children with the help of the head of the night market - Jiang Yiguan. (PG)(重)在夜市卖药炖排骨的蔡月霞与经商的丈夫李庆祥育有一对子女。原本幸福的家庭却因庆祥在外有另一名女人而被摧毁。月霞辛苦地抚养子女，幸有夜市老大江一官在旁扶持，但月霞的女儿友慧却不支持两人的关系。.

A series of comedy ensures, each reflecting local societal concerns in a light-hearted manner. programme.desc: (R) The Young Xiao Shiye is known for his strong sense of justice and integrity. He uses his wisdom and wit to solve the people's daily problems and many challenges. (重)小师爷真名施野，极富侠气和正义感。日常生活中，用自己的智慧和勇气，克服各种困难，帮周围的人解决了大大小小的麻烦，维护了正义和公理。.

programme.title: 芈月传 The Legend Of Miyue - EP 50
programme.desc: (R) As Emperor Qin procrastinates on naming his successor, Empress Qin and her advisers decide that they should now focus on finding Dang-er a suitable wife. Meantime, Dang-er chances on Wei Yi, the beautiful niece of Wei Yan, and falls in love with her. (PG)(重)由于秦王对册立太子一事，迟迟未有定案，秦王后与其谋士，遂决定先为荡儿安排婚事。与此同时，荡儿在宫中游荡，偶然发现魏夫人的美丽侄女魏颐，惊为天人，从此为她神魂颠倒。.

programme.title: 银色嘉年华 Silver Carnival - EP 19
programme.desc: Every home has its own story. Guests Wang Changli, Chen Meixin and Liao Yongyi, with age differences, will be sharing some inseparable memories of their families and things that happened at home. What kind of aspirations they have for their future home? Also in this episode, celebrity chef Daniel Koh will be sharing his special dish and he will sing us a song. 聊到“家”每个人都有自己的故事。嘉宾王昌黎、陈美心、廖永谊，不同年龄的他们对家里的人、事、物有哪些割舍不下的记忆？他们对未来的家又有着怎样的憧憬？名厨许树洲除了在节目中分享美食以外，也将为大家深情献唱。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 194
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 入侵者 Doppelganger - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Rui Jie exposes Rui Ming's act of embezzlement during the board meeting, forcing him to step down of his position. Additionally, he lets out the news to the public, causing a huge impact on the company's stock prices. Li Wei reprimands Rui Jie for sacrificing the interests of the company just to bring him down. Li Wei agrees to Rui Jie's offer to buy all his stocks from him, and plans to escape after receiving the payment from Rui Jie. (PG)(重)锐杰在董事会揭发"锐明"挪用公款的事，要将他赶下台，还把此事泄露出去，导致公司股价大跌。立威怒责锐杰为了打击他竟然不顾公司利益，锐杰建议"锐明"把股份全卖给他。立威答应，打算拿到钱后一走了之。.

Xiao Mi finds out that the vice chairman and his superior CEO Charles Chong do not get along, and hopes that Charles Chong can help them against the vice chairman. To his surprise, Charles is Shu Yu's ex-boyfriend! (PG)定一被人诬陷收取贿赂，George要他暂时停职，等待调查。莫副总也成为书彧喜铺的大楼业主，要求涨一倍租金，要将书彧逼走。小米探听到莫副总与上司CEO Charles Chong不和，决定通过Charles Chong来制肘莫副总，没想到Charles竟是书彧的前男友！.

programme.title: 超人哪里找 Oh My Heroes! - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Being a hawker is usually a physically tiring and thankless job, Mdm Wong works hard to sustain this integral part of our culture. She might be an uneducated stall owner, but she can also give back to her community by offering food to the less fortunate. Maisurah & Dayana are making a difference to the needy by providing them with nice Baju Kurung, a traditional outfit worn by Malays, through an initiative called "Gift-A-Kurung". (重)在白桥熟食中心，提及卖烧腊的娥姐是无人不知，无人不晓。做了几十年的小贩，尽管没有受过什么高深教育，她仍坚信应该回馈社会，关心较不幸的人。她察觉到附近有不少独居老人，于是每月分发百多张固本，让老人家可以来领取免费的午餐吃。对于回教徒来说，开斋节是一个非常重要的节庆。一家人穿上新衣去拜访亲友，彼此祝福。然而低收入家庭要添购新衣却是很有压力的事，于是Maisurah和Dayana在2016年就发起了这个活动，呼吁马来族群把状态尚好的服饰或者新衣捐出来。.

programme.title: 小女花不弃 I Will Never Let You Go - EP 51
programme.desc: Buqi agreed to marry Dongfang Shi and refused to leave with Chenyu as she wanted to lure out the Mysterious Man so Chenyu can get rid of him. (PG-些许暴力画面)(大结局)不弃同意嫁给东方炻，不让陈煜带她走，因为她想引出神秘人，然后陈煜可以把神秘人干掉。.

programme.desc: (R) Hearts & Hugs features celebrities using their talents to organise and execute an on-ground event to raise funds to help beneficiaries tie through a critical period of their lives. (重)在《爱心72小时》中，艺人们为善不落人后，在忙碌的日程中抽出72小时，根据自己的强项为急需帮助的家庭筹划一项爱心募款活动。.

programme.title: 走遍天涯打工乐 Jobs Around The World - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Join Bryan and Kym as they work their way around the world to discover and experience unique jobs that Singaporeans can never imagine. You will be amazed at the myriad of interesting jobs that came about from the rich cultures of different countries. Watch as the people work tirelessly on unique jobs that they are proud of, and take a step closer to hear of their reasons for choosing their "career paths" over others. (重)世界那么大，工作那么多，你都见识过了吗？以各国文化所产生的不同行业为主，鐘琴和禄江会亲自造访并体验世界各地的奇特工作。这份工作到底从何而起？这些人又为什么选择从事这份工作？近距离了解他们有趣的行业， 听听他们诉说其中的苦于乐，《走遍天涯打工乐》将带您体验新加坡人无法想象的各样工作.

programme.title: 喵星人 Holiday Movie: Meow
programme.desc: An alien lifeform from a faraway planet has been residing on Earth for thousands of years. They transform themselves into cats and populate every area of the globe. Their intelligence and adorability have led to them being treated as kings and queens by their human minions. Xi Xili is the latest visitor from their home planet, Planet Meow. He is an adorable oversized-cat-like being that has come to invade Earth and ensure his planet's survival. (PG)千百年来，地球上一直住着一种外星生物，名叫喵星人。它们从遥远的喵星来到地球，化身为猫科动物，分散在世界每个角落。萌萌的外表，加上机智聪明的头脑，轻易就得到人类的宠爱。不愁吃喝的它们桀骜不驯，活像饱经沧桑的江湖大佬。犀犀利就是他们中的一员，作为一名正牌的喵星来客，它肩负使命长途跋涉来到地球，却意外遇到了吴守龙（古天乐饰演）一家，上演了一幕相运相生，喵趣横生的人猫奇遇记。.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺 Golden Age Talentime - EP 19
programme.desc: A popular singing competition which provides the elderly with a platform to showcase their singing talent. 这个深受乐龄人士欢迎的歌唱比赛为爱唱歌的乐龄朋友提供了演出的平台。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 95
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 国庆献词2019 National Day Message 2019
programme.desc: (R) Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Finance Mr Heng Swee Keat delivers the National Day Message ahead of Singapore's 54th National Day celebrations. (重).

programme.title: 国庆庆典2019 National Day Parade 2019
programme.desc: (Live) Celebrate our nation's 54th birthday here at the Padang. This year's parade, laid out in six acts and entitled 'Our Singapore', tells the story of our Lion City from past to present, and calls on all Singaporeans to come together and be pioneers of our nation's future. (现场直播).

programme.title: 你那边怎样 我这边OK制作特辑 Making Of All Is Well
programme.desc: How do you watch a drama series with two parallel plots? Let Zoe Tay, Chen Hanwei, Desmond Tan, Blue Lan, Joanne Tseng, Elvin Ng, Romeo Tan and many more of the cast from Singapore and Taiwan tell you more about this exciting drama that is based on the true story of Taiwan's infamous ATM-hacking crimes in 2016. 什么是双线戏剧？该怎么看？让郑惠玉、陈汉玮、范文芳、陈泂江、蓝正龙、曾之乔、曾沛慈、黄俊雄、陈罗密欧，还有剧中其他新加坡和台湾两地的众多演员告诉你，《你那边怎样.我这边OK》这部新加坡和台湾两地合作的创新概念双线戏剧有多精彩！.

programme.title: 我的万里挑一 My One In A Million - EP 15
programme.desc: Shu Yu brought Ding Yi to see her psychologist friend Zi Hao for treatment. Zi Hao decides to test if Ding Yi will also emit an unpleasant smell when he gets close to other girls. Shu Yu volunteered for the test. She pretends to kiss Ding Yi, and Ding Yi emits an unpleasant smell. Shu Yu thinks that this test proves that Ding Yi will emit an unpleasant smell with all girls, but Ding Yi begins to suspect that he has fallen for Shu Yu. (PG)书彧带定一去见心理治疗师朋友子豪，让他治疗。子豪决定测试定一面对其他女生是否也会引发狐臭问题，书彧自愿参加测试，假装要吻定一，定一果然发出狐臭。书彧认为测试证明定一对一般女性也会发出狐臭，定一却怀疑自己喜欢上书彧。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 食尚口袋名單 Gourmet Guides - EP 10
programme.desc: Discover sumptuous cuisine in major cities as you get on the food trail, liberally sprinkled with a new list of highly-recommended restaurants. 一起去搜寻食尚潮人经常打卡光顾的主题餐厅，让你在结合创意与食尚的舒适空间中尽享美食。店家除了介绍餐厅主题和招牌菜色，也会与你分享食谱.

programme.title: 我的女兒琴四月 My Daughter, Geum Sa-weol - EP 62
programme.desc: (R) Wanhou plans to make a comeback with the pinewood he stole from Zhixiang 26 years ago, but Minhao and Qihuang manage to steal the pinewood away. Siyue and Wuyue lure Huixiang to the memorial park. Huixiang faints from shock when she sees Wuyue. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)万厚企图用26年前从志翔那儿偷来的松木东山再起，那批松木却被民豪和奇煌调包。四月和五月把慧翔引到纪念公园去，然后让慧翔看到五月走向她。慧翔惊吓过度，晕倒。.

programme.title: 浪漫医师金师傅 Doctor Romantic - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Dongzhu receives a document from an unknown man showing that the doctor responsible for the delay of his father's operation years ago was Fu Yongzhou, who is now known as Dr. Jin. The pain of losing his father engulfs him once again... (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)东柱收到神秘人寄来有关当年耽误东柱父亲手术的文件，发现那位主治医生就是夫勇周，也就是现在的金师傅，心情感到万分复杂，旧时失去父亲的痛苦来袭困扰着他。。。。。。.

programme.title: 浪漫医师金师傅 Doctor Romantic - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Reporter Wu Shengcai visits nurse Lú's noddle shop with the hope of unearthing the truth of Zhang Xianzhu's death and the reason Dr. Jin was driven away from Juda Hospital. Renfan finds a document from Juda Hospital which reveals his father's evil deeds. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴圣才记者为了挖掘十四年前张贤珠的真正死因及金师傅被巨大医院赶走的真相，来到了卢护理师的乌冬面店。仁范在大家忙着送受伤的金师傅和他父亲去医院时，在庆功会捡到了“巨大医院代理手术名单"的文件，打开来看后发现了父亲之前所做的恶行。.

programme.title: 无限歌谣季 Unlimited Song Season - EP 9
programme.desc: A variety show that allows the professional singer-songwriters to collaborate with non-professionals who were deemed to have potential to excel in the music industry. 该节目以音乐节为形式，让专业音乐人化身“无限唱作人"和非专业的“歌谣研修生"搭档创作新音乐.

programme.title: 走近科学 Approaching Science Sr 9 - EP 10
programme.desc: Brace yourself for another season of exciting subjects and intriguing discoveries in the new "Approaching Science". 近几年，地质灾害频繁，与地质灾害抗争将是一场持久战。群策群防员平时负责查看地形，遇到降雨或是有险情的苗头，就及时向政府汇报。在西南地区，滑坡如同隐蔽的敌人，比泥石流更难发觉，探地雷达是掌握地质结构内部变化的一种手段，它能够找到地下介质的分界面，通过计算，最终找到滑动带的深度位置。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 17
programme.desc: Incensed that Daojing loves pretty Haiying more, Haiying went to their company gathering and bashed pretty Haiying. After the wedding cancellation was exposed, Daojing felt very sorry for Haiying. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)知道道京更喜欢漂亮的海英之后，海英在她们公司聚会，殴打漂亮的海英。毁了婚礼的事件暴露，道京对海英感到更内疚。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 18
programme.desc: A depressed Haiying called in, to a radio talk show to air her grievances, but unintentionally disclosed her real name. As a result, everyone knows about her cancelled wedding. (PG-些许性相关语)(双声道-中/韩)沮丧的海英打电话上电台倾诉，不小心暴露了自己真实名字。结果所有人都知道她被毁婚一事。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 Sound Of My Dream S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Sound Of My Dream is a music program which invites Chinese pop singers to challenge musicians and other singers to pit their skills. Mentors and singers put in their best to show the essence of music, regardless of the outcome. (重)《梦想的声音》（原《声音的战争》）是一档由浙江卫视所打造的音乐节目，邀请到华语乐坛歌手面对面进行“歌艺过招”，导师与素人歌手抛开所有包袱，毫无保留的相互讨教，竭尽所能展现出音乐本质。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Somewhere in Balestier, there's a mysterious tea-cart that serves fresh drinks every day. Who is responsible for this? Peifen also meets one of Singapore's last surviving Samsui woman, a quaint East side shophouse that has survived WW2 bombings and a Mercedes crash and the lady who lived to tell the tale. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be before hand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (重)“谁来晚餐" 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露.

programme.title: 健康误区 Healthy U - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Looking much older than your peers who are around your age? What are the signs of lower metabolism? How to improve metabolism through diet and exercise? How to eat to regain youthful energy? What food will make you age faster? Guest Artistes Aileen Tan and Lina Ng (重)(最后一集)第十集：抗老化找回代谢力每当我们对镜自照，就会因为多一根白头发，多几条皱纹而懊恼不已。老化是现代人最怕提起的字眼。专家说：人的生死存活，全看糖分脸色。因为糖化是带来老化和引发疾病的罪魁祸首。但什么是醣老化呢？常吃、爱吃甜食有关吗？要如何与糖分共处呢？ 幸福料理：鮭鱼芽菜捲嘉宾：陈丽贞/黄嫊芳.

programme.title: 极境之旅 Forbidding No More - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Croatia, a country rich in culture and history, was once struggling with war and freedom two decades ago. Today, its beauty attracts millions of tourists annually. Michelle Chia, the host for this episode of "Forbidding No More" travels to Croatia to discover what's drawing tourists there. (重)在二十几年前饱受战火蹂躏与摧残的克罗地亚，如今凭着绝佳景色，悠久的历史和丰富的文化而全年吸引大批旅客前来观光。克罗地亚究竟有何魅力？随着《极境之旅》的主持人谢韵仪，一起体会克罗地亚的美吧！.

programme.title: 我的女兒琴四月 My Daughter, Geum Sa-weol - EP 63
programme.desc: (R) Qihuang finds out that Huixiang has indirectly caused Wuyue to fall from height previously and wants Shixun to deal with Huixiang justly. Canbin fights with a customer when he works as a part-time driver. The customer wants a hefty sum of compensation or he will sue Canbin. Deyi refuses to help Canbin. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧翔间接害五月坠楼一事被奇煌发现了。奇煌希望世勋依法办事。世勋虽痛苦，但答应为五月讨公道。灿彬当代理驾驶，因与客人打架而被警方扣留。客人要玛莉付高额的和解金否则提出告诉。玛莉求得艺帮忙，却被得艺拒绝。.

programme.title: 我的女兒琴四月 My Daughter, Geum Sa-weol - EP 64
programme.desc: (R) Wanhou says he will divorce Deyi for the sake of Canbin and Siyue. Deyi knows Wanhou is plotting to make use of Canbin and Siyue and thus refuses to give her blessings to the couple. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)万厚说他愿意为了孩子们的幸福牺牲自己，提议跟得艺离婚，从夫妻改做亲家。得艺知道完后要利用灿彬和四月向她宣战，于是不同意让四月跟灿彬结婚。.

programme.title: 浪漫医师金师傅 Doctor Romantic - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Lianhua was negligent while treating her patient, so Renfan reprimanded her in front of everyone, without consideration for her feelings. Nurse Enzhuo got angry and quarrelled with Renfan. When others tried to ease the situation, they accidentally found out that Renfan's ideal partner is Ruizhen and Lianhua's is Dongzhu... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)莲花在治疗患者时失误，仁范又再次不顾其自尊心地当众责备她。恩卓护理师见了，十分地生气地挺身而出与他争吵。大家事后为他们缓和开解，意外得知仁范的理想型是瑞贞，莲花的理想型是东柱。。。。。。.

programme.title: 浪漫医师金师傅 Doctor Romantic - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) Dongzhu receives a letter from USA and hides the content from Ruizhen. Ruizhen notices that Dongzhu is unhappy after receiving the lettter. Meanwhile, Dr. Jin's first love gets to know Dr. Jin's whereabouts from a report on artificial heart operation. She looks for Dr. Jin at the Shiyuan Hospital... (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)东柱收到了来自美国的信件，然而他却对瑞贞隐瞒信件的内容。瑞贞对于收到信件之后就闷闷不乐的东柱相当在意。另一边厢，金师傅的初恋情人因为人工心脏手术的报道而知道了金师傅的行踪，找上了石垣医院。。。。。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 19
programme.desc: Daojing destroyed Director Zhang and his mother's wedding ceremony. Director Zhang makes use of disgruntled Taizhen to take revenge on Daojing. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)道京毁了张会长和他的母亲的婚礼。气愤的张会长打算利用怨气满腹的振泰对付道京予以报复。.

programme.desc: Haiying has a bad cold, but did not take her medicine. Later, her mother found her unresponsive, so she rushed Haiying to the hospital. Shen Duohui provides an audio recording to prove Shikui murdered Jin Zhixi. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海英和秀贤想要搜集证据去起诉韩世奎，期间他们发现了申多慧其实仍然在世，韩世奎之前所杀的是金智喜。申多慧提供一段录音以证明世奎杀害金智喜。。。。。。.

programme.title: 小当家 Little Maestros - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) 13-year-old Sreimey lives in a suburb of Prey Veng, Cambodia - her father passed away in an accident 4 years ago, mother remarried a year later and cut off contact. Impoverished, she left school to care for her sister and run a breakfast stall with her grandmother. Her days are filled with mundane chores. (重)诗乐麦住在柬埔寨波萝勉省郊外。4年前，父亲意外逝世；隔年，母亲改嫁，从此音讯全无。因为家里贫穷，13岁的她被迫辍学，留在家中照顾妹妹并帮忙外婆经营早餐生意，每天埋首于琐碎家务中。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) There has been an upward trend of flash marriages. What are the main causes for this? Can flash marriages last longer than normal relationships? In this episode, Alfred and Kewei discuss why they tied the knot only after 10 years of dating. Don't miss it! (重)女艺人纷纷闪婚，究竟是什么原因呢？难道她们都是因为前男友恐婚造成的？嘉宾们对闪婚有什么独特见解？闪婚和长跑爱情哪个会长久？夫妻沈志豪和郑可为为什么长跑10年才结婚？来听听嘉宾们爆料，保证让你笑翻天！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Xiantai develops feelings for Xiuqing and feels that he has let Yingcai down. Zaiyong insists in sending Xiuqing to work every day to prevent her from interacting with Xiantai. Xiuqing is displeased with the arrangement. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰对秀卿产生感情，却觉得对不起英彩，因此十分矛盾。载永坚持每天送秀卿上班，不让她跟贤泰同车。秀卿觉得被监视，很不高兴。.

programme.title: 結婚契約 Marriage Contract - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Zhixun finds out that Cheng-Guo has gotten Huixiu to sign on an agreement to state that she has tricked Zhixun into agreeing to a fake marriage and organ transaction. Zhixun appears before the board of directors and declares that he will bear full responsibility for the wrongdoings. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)治勋发现成国要慧秀签了陈述书，指自己引诱及诈骗治勋。成国为了帮治勋脱罪，将陈述书交给理事们过目，治勋却突然出现在理事会的现场。治勋说事情一切因他而起，他会负起所有责任，辞去公司的职务。成国气治勋不领情。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 57
programme.desc: Zaijun finally reunites with Hua-er. Shiyan realises that she is being monitored and purposely puts on a show with Shali and Cheshun to mislead Minghuan into believing that Shiyan's secret weapon is a fabric processing technique. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)东肃拦截大均，逼他说出假扮宰英哥哥的事。宰俊和宰英终于相认。世妍发现自己被监视，于是故意在办公室里说她的秘密武器就是布料加工技术。明焕吩咐下属将加工技术应用在即将发表的Bella服装上，结果布料全部破损，明焕无法发表作品。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 58
programme.desc: Yingshu hopes Shiyan can work with Jinghui to force Minghuan out of the company, but Shiyan refuses to as she cannot forgive Jinghui's past actions. Minghuan plans to bribe the owner of a fabric factory not to supply his fabric to Shiyan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)英淑希望世妍和京慧合作把明焕赶出公司，但世妍觉得京慧之前的行为，所以不愿意跟京慧合作。明焕计划收买布料厂商，切断世妍的布料来源，让她做不了衣服。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 7
programme.desc: The next morning, Xiao Qi takes Kai Xiang around Irkutsk in hopes of jogging his memory. They stop by the local market they explored five years ago in their search for Kloudiia. It was there and then that they had started to develop feelings for each other all those years ago. That night, Kenneth decides to pass Xiao Qi the photograph he found. Meanwhile, Kai Xiang is washing up in the bathroom when he starts to see horrifying visions of him holding a bloody knife. (PG)筱琦带着凯翔逛当地的市集，向凯翔叙述着五年前的回忆。当时两人是在寻找Kloudiia的途中，慢慢产生感情的。而当下，两人的互动也变多了起来，感情逐步升温。但当筱琦主动亲吻凯翔时，他却避开了。当晚，Kenneth决定将之前餐厅发现的照片拿给筱琦，筱琦愕然。而与此同时，正在浴室梳洗的凯翔，突然在镜中见到了可怕的画面。镜中的他，手握沾满血的刀。而Kloudiia也昏迷在血红的浴缸中…….

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 7
programme.desc: Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. 幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 14
programme.desc: When questioned by Kent, Ling Xiong confesses that Gao Zijie is her son. To comfort her adopted son, Ling Xiong tells Kent that he means a lot to her and she values all the years that they have been together. (PG)在令千佑的追问下，令熊终于透露，高子杰是她的亲生儿子。为了安抚她的这位养子，令熊告诉令千佑，他对她一直都很重要，她不希望高子杰的出现，损坏到他们这么多年的感情。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻包括国会摘要 News Tonight (With Highlights From Parliament)
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

Meanwhile, Kai Xiang is washing up in the bathroom when he starts to see horrifying visions of him holding a bloody knife. (PG)(重)筱琦带着凯翔逛当地的市集，向凯翔叙述着五年前的回忆。当时两人是在寻找Kloudiia的途中，慢慢产生感情的。而当下，两人的互动也变多了起来，感情逐步升温。但当筱琦主动亲吻凯翔时，他却避开了。当晚，Kenneth决定将之前餐厅发现的照片拿给筱琦，筱琦愕然。而与此同时，正在浴室梳洗的凯翔，突然在镜中见到了可怕的画面。镜中的他，手握沾满血的刀。而Kloudiia也昏迷在血红的浴缸中…….

programme.title: Fresh！新登场 Fresh Takes - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (重)(大结局)倪芯妮和郭树宇8岁时，机缘巧合在一棵树下结识成为好朋友。妮妮性格活泼开朗，树宇则有些文静，缺乏自信。儿时的树宇爱画画，妮妮爱表演唱歌。树宇对爬树有些恐惧，妮妮则天不怕地不怕，爬树本领顶呱呱。日积月累，两人一起玩耍，最后树宇也克服了爬树的恐惧，两人也算门当户对。可惜树宇在一年后跟父母离开新加坡。他离开的那一年，妮妮失去了父母，让她在同一时间内失去了最亲密的人。她投靠了跑歌台的阿姨张爱萍。 年轻的爱萍负起了照顾侄女的责任。爱萍是位癌症战胜者，在经历化疗时曾经语无伦次提到要唱自己的歌。妮妮为了报答阿姨的养育之恩，希望在她有生之年为她写一首歌，但却因为华语不好无法填词只懂得作曲。 妮妮身边有已位高富帅--王俊豪一直献殷情，想尽办法博取妮妮的芳心。因为自己没有能力，决心要找词神来帮她完成这首歌。词神身份隐秘，唯一的方法就是要通过与他常合作的音乐制作人罗明。 俊豪终于找到罗明但是却被他拒绝。原本以为希望破灭的俊豪正准备把坏消息告诉妮妮，谁料他突然接到罗明的电话说词神愿意见他。原来妮妮小时候的一句话无形中造就了树宇成为了一名成功的填词人，只是他选择了躲在笔名后，而且还决定窝在小贩中心卖烤鸡翅。.

programme.title: Fresh! 新登场 - 咖啡的偶遇 Fresh Takes - The Encounter
programme.desc: "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (PG)(重)阳光开朗的大学生Jane同一天不幸丢失了两份兼职工作。从小失去父母的Jane必须扛起家里的费用自食其力。正当她为学费发愁时，心不在焉的过马路，幸亏有惊无险。在这机缘巧合下，Jane无意间看到了一间看似寻常却别有用处的咖啡厅。众所不知，这间咖啡厅竟是魂魄的聚集点，而咖啡厅里唯一的咖啡师，是专门协助魂魄完成遗愿的死神。一位活生生笑嘻嘻的女孩，大咧咧的闯进了死神的地盘，竟敢向死神讨兼职工作！？这一切太巧合了，令人难以置信，会不会有人在幕后操纵？.

programme.title: 百味人生 Food Of Life - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Marriage is a big event in life and wedding banquet is an important part of the wedding to leave deep impression among the guests. The grand feast is hosted by the new couple to celebrate their union and also to express their gratitude to friends and relatives for their blessings through good food. (重)结婚是人生大事，婚宴是婚礼中给宾客留下印象中的重要环节，新人以百味美食招待尽可能做到宾主尽欢，在喜宴上要表达对亲友的感谢，亲友在喜宴上传到对新人的祝福和嘱托。喜宴是婚礼中答谢宾客而举办的隆重宴席。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing tells Zaiyong that she has fallen for Xiantai. The enraged Zaiyong brings Xiuqing to look at Xiantai, Xiaoxun and Zhenshu from a distance. Xiuqing mistakes Xiantai for two-timing her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿告诉载永她已经有喜欢的人了。载永气愤，把秀卿带到贤泰家附近，让秀卿看到贤泰跟真淑和小勋互动的情景，让秀卿误会贤泰是有婚事的人，脚踏两船。秀卿受打击。.

programme.title: 結婚契約 Marriage Contract - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Zhixun plans to propose to Huixiu at their new apartment. However, Huixiu faints on her way to meet Zhixun. Huixiu requires an emergency surgery to relieve the pressure in her brain. However, as the surgery is very dangerous, Huixiu may pass away midway through the operation. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)治勋打算向慧秀求婚，于是布置好新居约慧秀过去，还请浩准帮忙弹吉它。慧秀在前往新居的途中突然动弹不得，随后晕倒送院。慧秀的脑压急升，必须做排除脑内积水的紧急手术。由于手术非常危险，慧秀可能会在手术台上丧命。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 59
programme.desc: Zaijun intends to get Jinghui to fake her death to trick Minghuan and Xiaojing into believing that they can lay their hands on her assets. He plans to get rid of Minghuan and Xiaojing together after that. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)宰俊向世妍透露他的计划：让京慧装死，误导明焕和孝静，然后把明焕和孝静一网打尽。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 60
programme.desc: Xiaojing gets Minghuan to hand over his divorce agreement with Jinghui. Shortly after, Jinghui pretends to take her own life and Zaijun gets a reporter to spread news of Jinghui's death. Believing that Jinghui is really dead, Xiaojing passes the divorce agreement to Zaijun. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)孝静诱惑明焕，然后指使他在离婚协议书上签名。随后，京慧假装服药自杀。宰俊买通记者在媒体上散播京慧自杀的新闻。孝静信以为真，照约定将京慧和明焕的离婚协议书交给宰俊。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 11
programme.desc: Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be before hand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. “谁来晚餐" 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 15
programme.desc: Johnny Cub demands the return of the missing weapons in exchange for the release of Chloe whom he has kidnapped. A face-off with Cub, Ruan Qingxin vows to kill him in revenge for her parents' death. (PG13-暴力镜头)Johnny Cub先绑架Chloe, 然后以此要挟，逼令熊归还军火，以作为交换。决战在即，阮清欣告诉自己，她必须手刃Johnny Cub，以为父母报仇。.

programme.title: 创! (PG) Start Up! - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Xuan made an impressive presentation at the prestigious technology seminar despite the hiccups. (PG)(重)在科技展，殷萱发现呈现的档案不见了，不过殷萱坚持呈现。 殷萱呈现完，投机商纷纷向前要求商谈合作计划。 殷萱在人群中看到孙少。Jessie希望奇才帮她找12年前的thumbdrive，因为里头有证据证明当年贪污的是Jessie。.

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心 Going Miles, Spreading Smiles - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Started by Mother and Son team, Sheila and Addis, "Cook for Strangers" is about breaking down barriers, restoring relationships, and forging new bonds through food.
